name: Minio - Leaky Buckets
hints: The vulnerability is in a specific version of a popular object storage service. What's the CVE?
The vulnerability is related to the bootstrap process and discloses sensitive information from environment variables.
A Proof of Concept for CVE-2023-28432 can be found online. It involves a POST request to a specific API endpoint.
preface:
We've set up an instance of the Minio object storage service for you.
It seems to be an older version, but the sysadmin swears it's secure.
Your mission is to find three flags hidden in this environment.
postface:
Excellent work! You found all three flags.
This shows why keeping software up-to-date is critical.
